quote: If you let your head get too big, it'll break your neck.
Every time I look in the mirror I see a person I truly hate. And then I realize it's not a mirror, it's a window.
If your coffee order is more than four words you are a part of the problem.
If you can't laugh at yourself that's okay because the rest of us can laugh at you instead.
A day without sunshine is like night.
I'm sorry you're so easily offended.
You can't just turn on creativity like a faucet. You have to be in the right mood. What mood is that? Last-minute panic.
The best things in life are actually really expensive.
I always wanted to be a procrastinator, never got around to it.
An optimist thinks that this is the best possible world. A pessimist fears that this is true.
I studied for my blood test.
Be yourself. No one else wants to be you.
